value.name: Chief Frank Clark
value.description: We speak with Chief Frank Clark, Portland Police Department on the issues surrounding their calls for service involving mental health and suicide during the pandemic. If you believe that you or someone you know could be in crisis,

value.name: How policing in Maine has changed in year since George Floyd’s murder
value.description: Tuesday marks one year since the murder of George Floyd by a Minneapolis police officer. Floyd’s killing sparked protests in Portland against police brutality. Portland police Chief Frank Clark took a knee in solidarity and commissioned a study on racial bias in the police department.
